item.title: EQ Framework
item.description:
Emotional Intelligence Isnâ€™t a Buzzword. Itâ€™s a Weapon.

Startups that collapse early donâ€™t do it because their product sucks.
They do it because their people donâ€™t communicate, donâ€™t trust, or burn out fast.

Thatâ€™s not a hiring problem. Thatâ€™s a culture problem.

ğŸŒ€ Spiral Dynamics Meets Startup Reality

I use Spiral Dynamics and AQAL theory to build teams that work because they understand each other. Not just their rolesâ€”but how they process, collaborate, and recover from stress.

item.title: The VP Override That Became a Power Trio
item.description:
